Distribution of Published Fiscal ROSCs

This map shows countries that have published Fiscal ROSCs. To access the documents in pdf format, click on the green balloon for the country you wish to see, or select the country from the drop-down box. A full list of ROSCs by country is also available. Return to the Fiscal Transparency website.

DISCLAIMER:This map is powered by Google Maps. Country borders or names do not necessarily reflect the IMF's official position.
